SimpleDataListSpec.Name: ChildrenToSponsor Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: List of children for a sponsorship
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPSimpleList.common:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_CHILDREN_TO_SPONSOR as select ID as VALUE, NAME as LABEL from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD order by NAME
